faq.ans: Permit requirements depend on event size and location. For large public events or street closures, the City of Zanesville, IN may require permits. Haute Porta Potty Rental can guide you on local requirements and coordinate with event organizers or venue managers.

faq.ques: Can you provide handwashing stations and sanitation supplies?
faq.ans: Yes. We rent standalone handwashing stations, sanitized touchless dispensers, and provide supplies like soap and paper products. Handwashing stations are recommended for food events, health-conscious gatherings and to meet local health guidelines.
